Text:
Thanks! I bought this years ago when I was in school, and then lost it. I was never able to find it in stores ever again. It's pretty fun and I just found myself getting it to work on a new PC with Windows 7 of all things!

Very cool to find this again after so long...
I havn't downloaded it yet, and I don't even care if it doesn't work because I just got smacked in the face with a sackload of nostalgia, thanks.
Actually ignore my last comment. Every time I try to open BRSETUP.exe my whole system freezes up and then crashes. Fucks sake.
